entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
